Html:
I am using the standard "GMapMarkerCircle" found in demo source. 
Public Sub New(ByVal p As PointLatLng, ByVal Radiusen As Integer, ByVal id As String)
    MyBase.New(p)
    Radius = Radiusen
    Tag = id
    IsHitTestVisible = True
End Sub
I have tried different methods to catch the click on the circle.


GMap_OnMarkerClick, '
GMap_OnPolygonClick
GMap_OnMarkerEnter
